sentences.en: Bushy - tailed squirrels scurry to find acorns and nuts to hide.
sentences.cn: 大尾巴的松鼠忙着搜寻和贮藏橡果和松子.

sentences.en: He always wears a turban and has a big, bushy beard.
sentences.cn: 他的鼻子是长的, 又是钩形的.

sentences.en: He had a bony gentle face with bushy eyebrows.
sentences.cn: 他的脸憔悴,温和,眉毛很浓.

sentences.en: He had bushy eyebrows that grew together in the centre.
sentences.cn: 他长着毛茸茸的眉毛,眉宇间连在一起.

sentences.en: His big eyes darted about beneath his lofty, bushy brows.
sentences.cn: 他那大眼睛在翘得高高的眉毛底下骨溜溜地转动着.

sentences.en: His hair was almost white, but his eyebrows were bushy and still black.
sentences.cn: 他的头发几乎全已发白, 但是眉毛仍旧浓黑.

sentences.en: Now the eyes under their bushy gray brows had that sly look again.
sentences.cn: 现在那一双在浓重的灰眉毛下面的眼睛又发出了那种诡秘的表情.

sentences.en: Pinch back young plants after flowering to encourage bushy growth.
sentences.cn: 拔掉小的植被之前,开花促进植物繁殖生长.

sentences.en: Pinch out the tips of the young growths to make for compact, bushy plants.
sentences.cn: 掐掉幼株的芽尖以便让它们长得紧凑浓密，呈丛生状。

sentences.en: Some animals, as the fox and the squirrel, have bushy tails.
sentences.cn: 有些动物, 如狐狸和松鼠, 有毛绒绒的尾巴.

sentences.en: Such animals as foxes and squirrels have bushy tails.
sentences.cn: 有些动物,如狐和松鼠,有蓬松的尾巴.

sentences.en: The cultivated soybean is an erect, bushy annual plant of great morphological diversity.
sentences.cn: 栽培大豆是一种直立 、 丛生、形态变化很大的一年生植物.

sentences.en: The doctor straightens and turns: bushy hair, a heavy square face, a hard big jaw.
sentences.cn: 大夫挺直身子,转过身来: 浓密的沙色头发, 宽阔的方脸, 结实有力的大颚.

sentences.en: The sly Turkish fox vas going to show his bushy tail, Luca thought.
sentences.cn: 路加心里想:看来这只狡狯的“土耳其”狐狸快要露出毛茸茸的尾巴了.

words.tran_cn: 如灌木般长得低矮的；粗野的
疲倦的；被草丛笼罩的；不知所措的
丛生；以灌木装饰（bush的过去分词）
以灌木装饰；使…精疲力竭
浓密的；灌木茂密的；多毛的

trans.tran_en: bushy hair or fur grows thickly
